description.displayText:
Grazi has been part of our family for nearly three years, she's helped raise our children and take care of them like no other. She goes above and beyond in everything from playtime to learning. She is thoughtful, kind, fun and caring. But she's also incredibly organized, punctual and pro active - always arranging a play date, an arts and crafts activity or just reading. Whatever the task she does it with so much effort and her whole heart.
I cannot recommend her enough, she's been invaluable to our family and the next family will be so lucky to have her join their day to day lives!

description.displayText:
I hired her occasionally and my son loves her. She is extremely careful and lovely with kids, and is always looking for creative play and activities. 
It was important for me that my kid was not only taken care of, but also entertained, busy and feeling comfortable. She had it all. 
She can also prepare meals / snacks and take care of the housekeeping.
description.originalText:

description.displayText: I've known Graziele, (Grazie) now for over 2 years. She came to work with our family when our twins were 9 months old. Graziele is a natural with kids, I never forgot how my daughter felt completely comfortable from the fist moment she met Grazie. That had never happened before and I immediately knew I had nothing to worry about. Grazie is responsible and caring and has a great personality, our kids love her. She is pro-active and helped us with everything from planning dates, to preparing meals, bathing, playing and bringing them to the parks in Chelsea where we live. Oh and she is a great cook. She is still helping us occasionally and I highly recommend her.

description.displayText: Grazi, is one of the most joyful, energetic and lovely nannies I have ever known . She is the weekend nanny for the twins I am the nanny for during the week. The twins (Boy and Girl) are three years old and she has been working with them since they were six months. She is extremely professional, reliable and always careful and attentive with the children. She is a great deal full of experience and affectionate. I highly recommend her.

description.displayText: Grazie has been with our family for over 3 years. She has always been punctual, caring and helps out with anything we need. Our kids always look forward to seeing her and adore her. She always goes above and beyond. I highly recommend her.
